channel.title: Server Error
channel.description:
Hello when I try to open the server this appear:
Starting server on port: .... [ loaded shops] Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NumberFormatException: For input string: "-" at java.lang.NumerFormatException.forImputString<NumberFormatException.java.48> at java.lag.Integer.parseInt<Integer.java:476> at java.lag.Integer.parseInt<Integer.java:499> at.net.com.codeusa.world.item.Items.loaditemList<Items.java:353> at.net.com.codeusa.world.item.Items.<init><Items.java:37> at.net.com.codeusa.Engine.<int><Engine.java:137> at.net.com.codeusa.Server.main<Server.java:72> Press a key to continue...
What happended?

item.title: Server Error
item.dc:creator: @frostscapeserver frostscapeserver
item.description:
@frostscapeserver wrote:

[quote=“deathschaos9, post:3, topic:344498”][quote author=frostscapeserver link=topic=440875.msg3238839#msg3238839 date=1276726308]
You’re run.bat isn’t in the same folder as the gui.java file, I think.
[/quote]
What gave you that idea???

@OP
Your item configuration file has a - in it when it should not.[/quote]

Oops, sorry trying to post on multiple topics…=[
So tired, been studying for my finals.

Sorry
~tyler

Read full topic

item.description:
@deathschaos9 wrote:

frostscapeserver:

You’re run.bat isn’t in the same folder as the gui.java file, I think.

What gave you that idea???

@OP
Your item configuration file has a - in it when it should not.
